body.p:
You can use the Correct Grammar action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Rewrite category to ask the AI Positron to correct the grammar mistakes inside a DITA topic's selected content.

A Correct Grammar AI action is highly valuable to end users as it ensures that their written communication is error-free and professional. This AI action leverages advanced language processing algorithms to detect and correct grammatical errors, such as punctuation mistakes, subject-verb agreement issues, incorrect verb tenses, and more. By using this AI action, users avoid embarrassing grammar mistakes that could negatively impact their credibility, both in personal and professional contexts. It not only saves time by automatically fixing errors but also serves as a helpful tool for learning and improving one's grammar skills. With an AI assistant dedicated to correct grammar, users can confidently express themselves through flawless writing, making their communication more impactful and effective.
Open the topic, select the entire content and invoke the Correct Grammar action.
